Array Comprehension.description: An array comprehention loop. | See Moonscript Langauage Guide/Comprehensions.

Function.description: A function snippet. | See Moonscript Langauage Guide/Function Literals

Function(self).description: A function with an included `self` object, useful with classes. | See Moonscript Language Guide/Function Literals/Fat Arrow

Function Lambda.description: A lambda function | See Moonscript Language Guide/Function Literals

class ....description: A class object - `class` | See Moonscript Language Guide/Object Oriented Programming

class ... extends ....description: Class inheritance snippet - `extends` | See Moonscript Language Guide/Object Oriented Programming/Inheritance

if.description: An if statement | if 1 > 2 do print 'Bigger'

elseif.description: Elseif follows a if statment, however note this cannot be inside the if statement. | elseif 2 < 4 do print('Smaller')

if .. else.description: A if and else statment | if 1 < 2 do print('Smaller') else do print('Nope')

for ... in pairs ....description: A foor loop based on key value pairs | for ke,va in pairs table_a

for ... in ipairs ....description: A ipairs iteration `for` loop | for i, v in ipairs table_a

Switch.description: A switch/case function, it will target a group of values and let you use `case` to specifiy.

Unless.description: The opposite of an if statement, do unless 1 = 1 | See Moonscript Language Guide/Conditionals
